text: The 2014 Malaysia Cup Final was a football match which was played on 1 November 2014, to determine the winners of the 2014 Malaysia Cup. It was the final of the 88th edition of the Malaysia Cup, competition organised by the Football Association of Malaysia. The final was played between Johor Darul Takzim and Pahang.http://www.goal.com/en-my/news/5404/malaysia- cup/2014/11/01/5688391/jdt-2-2-pahang-pen-3-5-ten-man-pahang-retain-malaysia- cup?ICID=SP
